name: @emonkak/enumerable
description: Provides the individual methods of LINQ as a module

scripts.build: tsc --declaration --rootDir src --outDir dist && cp LICENSE README.md package.json dist/
scripts.cover: isparta cover --include-all-sources --report lcovonly --report html --report text ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --compilers js:babel-core/register

author: Shota Nozaki
